content: the popular **lux baby wrap** 1 - now in a lovely bamboo version the wrap is crocheted and has a simple and beautiful design that s framed by a cute edge that gives the wrap an incredibly beautiful and elegant look the wrap is crocheted in rainbow bamboo an exquisite yarn in sustainable materials made from 60% viscose from bamboo and 40% cotton the yarn absorbs moisture and contains substances that are said to have antibacterial properties they re very strong and add extra durability to the yarn it s both breathable and temperature regulating and perfect for babies have fun **materials ** rainbow bamboo color 14 recommended crochet hook us size c/2 3 mm **crochet gauge ** 20 stitches x 11 row = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm **measurements ** approx 31 1 x 31 4 inches 79 80 cm excl edge 35 8 x 36 2 inches 91 x 92 cm incl edge **yarn consumption ** approx 700 g 7 skeins **abbreviations ** chain chain stitch s stitch sts stitches double_crochet double crochet stitch single_crochet single crochet stitch half_double_crochet half double crochet stitch slip_stitch slip stitch l-blo lower back loop only 1 https //hobbii com/lux-bamboo-baby-blanket utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=bamboo-baby-blanket+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
